ThingML is a modeling language for embedded and distributed systems taking part in the Internet of Things (IoT). It consists of a metamodel supported by editors, a set of compilers (targeting C/Arduino, Java/Scala), and integrates main standards in the IoT, such as COaP, ZigBee, Bluetooth (Low Energy).

Franck Fleurey and myself are the core developers of ThingML. ThingML is hosted on GitHub and available as open-source (L-GPL)
